About Me

I am a Junior at SRM Institute of Science & Technology, currently pursuing a B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering with a specialization in Big Data Analytics. I am still exploring which role would suit me best, whether it be a Business Analyst, Data Engineer, or Software Engineer. For now, I am focused on improving my skills as a Software Engineering Fellow at Headstarter AI. My goal is to develop AI applications that can either attract 1000 waitlisted users, create 1000 accounts or even generate $1000 in revenue!

My Projects

  • Diamond Price Predictor

    User-friendly web application that simplifies the analysis and prediction of diamond prices. It also provides various visualizations to better understand the data.

  • Face Mask Detection Application

    An interactive web application that allows users to determine whether a person is wearing a mask.

  • OpenRTB Programmatic Advertising Dashboard

    Demo project which was designed to illustrate using Rill to analyze programmatic bid logs using the canonical open RTB framework.

  • Shortest Path Calculator

    This project allows users to explore the shortest distance between nodes in a graph using Python and Dijkstra's algorithm.
